      • when

        public void when(String code,
                 Closure<Object> closure)
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Response

        Configures the execution of the provided closure "when" the given status code (as a String) occurs in the response. The closure will be called with an instance of the response as a FromServer instance.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
}

http.get {
     request.uri.path = '/foo'
     response.when('404'){
         // executed when a 'not found' response is received
     }
}
        Specified by:
        when in interface HttpConfig.Response
        Parameters:
        code - the response code to be caught
        closure - the closure to be executed

      • when

        public void when(Integer code,
                 Closure<Object> closure)
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Response

        Configures the execution of the provided closure "when" the given status code occurs in the response. The closure will be called with an instance of the response as a FromServer instance.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
}

http.get {
     request.uri.path = '/foo'
     response.when(404){
         // executed when a 'not found' response is received
     }
}
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        closure - the closure to be executed

      • when

        public void when(HttpConfig.Status status,
                 Closure<Object> closure)
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Response

        Configures the execution of the provided closure "when" the given status occurs in the response. The closure will be called with an instance of the response as a FromServer instance.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
}

http.get {
     request.uri.path = '/foo'
     response.when(Status.SUCCESS){
         // executed when a successful response is received
     }
}
        Specified by:
        when in interface HttpConfig.Response
        Parameters:
        status - the response HttpConfig.Status enum
        closure - the closure to be executed

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
